title: TA-Based Mobile Learning for Hierarchical Scientific Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of biology and ecology, understanding of simple classification systems
context.additional_context: Corporate STEM education program designed to enable learners to apply hierarchical thinking when solving scientific problems

learning_goals: Learners can represent the hierarchical structure of biological classification as a concept map using a TA (agent).
Learners can identify scientific errors with 80% accuracy by analyzing the reasoning pathways generated by the TA.
Learners can solve ecosystem interaction problems with over 75% accuracy based on knowledge acquired through interaction with the TA.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
